Hurry up—"},{"lineNumber":29031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランッス、アッターーーーーーーッック！！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Rance, ATTAAAAAAAACK!!"},{"lineNumber":29032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐっ、ぐぎゃああああーーー！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Ugh, ugghyaaahhh!!?"},{"lineNumber":29033,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物兵の数人が、いきなり横合いからの","translatedEnglishLine":"Several demon soldiers were suddenly struck from the side"},{"lineNumber":29034,"originalJapaneseLine":"衝撃波で叩き潰される。","translatedEnglishLine":"and crushed by a shockwave."},{"lineNumber":29035,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ランス総統のお出ましだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"The Supreme Leader Rance has arrived!"},{"lineNumber":29036,"originalJapaneseLine":"　雑魚は引っ込んでろ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Weaklings, back off!"},{"lineNumber":29037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あっ、こ、こいつら……！","translatedEnglishLine":"Ah, th-these guys...!"},{"lineNumber":29038,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔人様を殺して回ってるとかいう……！」","translatedEnglishLine":"They say they are going around killing the demons...!"},{"lineNumber":29039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日は派手に行くぞ！","translatedEnglishLine":"Let's make it flashy today!"},{"lineNumber":29040,"originalJapaneseLine":"　魔物将軍が見つかるまで、他は皆殺しじゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Until we find the demon generals, kill all the others—!"}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍どもをびびらせる為に俺様が必要ってわけか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So you need me to scare the demon army, huh?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……多くの場合は、そうですね。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...In most cases, yes.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 影武者を立てる事も考えたのですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We also considered appointing a body double...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿な。この世界一の美貌と強さを兼ね備える
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Foolish. It's impossible to imitate me, who combines the world's greatest beauty and strength.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様に似せるなど不可能だろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no way to make a double that resembles me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「容姿はともかく。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Appearance aside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振る舞いと……何より、前線での強さが必要で。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s necessary is mannerisms and... above all, strength on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、頓挫しましたね」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In the end, the plan fell through.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ。強すぎるというのも困ったものだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hmph. Being too strong is a problem too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実際には、迅速に動いてひとつずつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In reality, we’ll have to move swiftly and handle things one by one...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: となると思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s how it will be, I think.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現状維持か…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, maintaining the status quo, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは少し、眉を寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance furrowed his brow slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味もなくウルザのお尻に手を伸ばし、はたかれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He reached out to Urza's rear for no reason and got slapped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……待てよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の連中をびびらせれば良いって言ったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said it’s enough to scare the demon army, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連中を壊滅させる必要はないな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no need to wipe them out completely, is there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　えぇ、そうですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Yeah, that's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういうのはどうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとずつ、全部の地域のやばい所で戦って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fight little by little in all the dangerous areas of each region,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚どもを追っ払うんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and drive off the weaklings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうすれば、時間を大してかけずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, without taking too much time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各方面を助けられる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you can support every front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは…………ううん、そうですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is... well, yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統と魔人討伐隊が、かなり過酷ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it will be tough on the leader and the demon extermination squad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐ……ええい、構わん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... whatever! I don’t care!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女どもを守るためだ。いっちょやってやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's to protect my women. I’m going all out!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、ランスの全方面同時支援作戦が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Rance’s all-front simultaneous support operation began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押せぇい、押せ押せええぇぇぇぇい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Push forward, push push pushhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数に物を言わせて叩き潰すのである！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll overwhelm them with sheer numbers and crush them!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっしゃ殺せーーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, kill them allーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひひひ、血だ、血をしゃぶりたくてたまらねえ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, blood, I can't wait to suck the blood!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただただ、芸も何もない突撃が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a plain, no-frills charge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な物量と勢いをもってリーザス軍を襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacked the Leazas army with overwhelming numbers and momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く……この、物量は……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... this, this overwhelming force...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突進の勢いを削ぐのじゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cut down the momentum of their charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……力押しが一番、堪えるわい……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...A brute force push is the hardest to bear...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、食い止め……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, hold them back...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、あの赤い連中は北の方にいるそうだからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, those red guys are said to be up north!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖いものなんかねえ！　さっさと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re not afraid of anything! Hurry up—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランッス、アッターーーーーーーッック！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, ATTAAAAAAAACK!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、ぐぎゃああああーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, ugghyaaahhh!!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の数人が、いきなり横合いからの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several demon soldiers were suddenly struck from the side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃波で叩き潰される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and crushed by a shockwave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統のお出ましだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Leader Rance has arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚は引っ込んでろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weaklings, back off!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、こ、こいつら……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, th-these guys...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人様を殺して回ってるとかいう……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say they are going around killing the demons...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日は派手に行くぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's make it flashy today!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が見つかるまで、他は皆殺しじゃー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we find the demon generals, kill all the others—!

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 振る舞いと……何より、前線での強さが必要で。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What’s necessary is mannerisms and... above all, strength on the front lines.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 結局、頓挫しましたね」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うーむ。強すぎるというのも困ったものだ」

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「実際には、迅速に動いてひとつずつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In reality, we’ll have to move swiftly and handle things one by one...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: となると思います」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That’s how it will be, I think.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「現状維持か…………」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: So, maintaining the status quo, huh...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスは少し、眉を寄せた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance furrowed his brow slightly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 意味もなくウルザのお尻に手を伸ばし、はたかれた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He reached out to Urza's rear for no reason and got slapped.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……待てよ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Wait a minute.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍の連中をびびらせれば良いって言ったな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You said it’s enough to scare the demon army, right?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 連中を壊滅させる必要はないな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There's no need to wipe them out completely, is there?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「え？　えぇ、そうですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? Yeah, that's right...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「こういうのはどうだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How about this?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ちょっとずつ、全部の地域のやばい所で戦って、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fight little by little in all the dangerous areas of each region,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚どもを追っ払うんだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and drive off the weaklings.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうすれば、時間を大してかけずに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That way, without taking too much time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 各方面を助けられる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you can support every front.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それは…………ううん、そうですね……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That is... well, yes...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統と魔人討伐隊が、かなり過酷ですが……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Though it will be tough on the leader and the demon extermination squad...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うぐ……ええい、構わん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... whatever! I don’t care!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺の女どもを守るためだ。いっちょやってやる！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's to protect my women. I’m going all out!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、ランスの全方面同時支援作戦が始まった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Rance’s all-front simultaneous support operation began.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「押せぇい、押せ押せええぇぇぇぇい！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Push forward, push push pushhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 数に物を言わせて叩き潰すのである！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’ll overwhelm them with sheer numbers and crush them!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うおっしゃ殺せーーーーーーー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, kill them allーーー!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ひひひ、血だ、血をしゃぶりたくてたまらねえ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehehe, blood, I can't wait to suck the blood!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ただただ、芸も何もない突撃が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Just a plain, no-frills charge,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧倒的な物量と勢いをもってリーザス軍を襲う。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: attacked the Leazas army with overwhelming numbers and momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「く……この、物量は……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh... this, this overwhelming force...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「突進の勢いを削ぐのじゃ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Cut down the momentum of their charge!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ……力押しが一番、堪えるわい……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...A brute force push is the hardest to bear...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「くっ、食い止め……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Damn, hold them back...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「へへ、あの赤い連中は北の方にいるそうだからな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hehe, those red guys are said to be up north!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 怖いものなんかねえ！　さっさと――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We’re not afraid of anything! Hurry up—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランッス、アッターーーーーーーッック！！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance, ATTAAAAAAAACK!!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐっ、ぐぎゃああああーーー！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, ugghyaaahhh!!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物兵の数人が、いきなり横合いからの
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Several demon soldiers were suddenly struck from the side

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 衝撃波で叩き潰される。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and crushed by a shockwave.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ランス総統のお出ましだ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The Supreme Leader Rance has arrived!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 雑魚は引っ込んでろ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Weaklings, back off!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あっ、こ、こいつら……！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, th-these guys...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人様を殺して回ってるとかいう……！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They say they are going around killing the demons...!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今日は派手に行くぞ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's make it flashy today!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物将軍が見つかるまで、他は皆殺しじゃー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until we find the demon generals, kill all the others—!
